mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, username, password, phone, email, real_name, avatar, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{realName}, #{avatar}, #{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, phone, email, real_name, avatar, description, create_time FROM user order by create_time DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
